caption: This photograph features a man, silhouetted, wearing a cowboy-style hat and glasses, and is dressed in a bright red jacket. The man is viewed from the side, facing a football field during a daytime game. The football field is visible in the background with players in the middle of a play and a crowd of spectators populating the stands extensively. The stadium is large with multiple tiers of seating, clearly filled with spectators predominantly dressed in red, suggesting a strong fan base for the home team. The photograph is artistically captured with the focus on the silhouette of the man, contrasting against the vivid background of the spectator-filled stadium and the field in play. This image captures an intimate spectatorâ€™s experience amidst a vibrant sports event atmosphere.
title: Big sports event of the year is the annual spring football game at the university of Nebraska.  This is an intra-squad game, and many fans wear red in honor of the team, nick-named the "big red."
